Nouri Bouzid (amụrụ n'afọ 1945) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye edemede ihe nkiri nke Tunisia
O duziri ihe nkiri asaa n'agbata afọ 1986 na afọ 2006
E gosipụtara ihe nkiri ya Man of Ashes na ngalaba "Un Certain Regard" na 1986 Cannes Film Festival. Afọ atọ ka e mesịrị, e gosipụtara ihe nkiri ya Golden Horseshoes n'otu ngalaba ahụ na mmemme 1989.
E gosipụtara Bouzid na ihe nkiri nke afọ 2009 banyere ahụmịhe ihe nkiri na ọdịbendị dị iche iche a na-akpọ Cinema Is Everywhere
